properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V POLAR EXPLORER
   TOWING 5.4 MILE LONG CABLE:
   A. 01 FEB IN AREA BOUND BY
      00-07.20S 043-11.42W, 01-39.85S 042-49.73W,
      01-47.88S 042-49.87W, 01-15.35S 043-11.23W.
   B. 02 FEB IN AREA BOUND BY
      01-45.95S 042-44.45W, 01-55.42S 042-06.77W,
      02-03.30S 042-06.77W, 01-51.30S 042-44.45W.
   C. 03 FEB VICINITY
      02-03.30S 042-06.77W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 04 FEB.
